analysis.description:
LOCIairdropper.transfer (/unique_chucks/17/0xe5cff4de133f7c23898ce49dad5a3715f507d85d.sol#265-272) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_address[i],_values[i]) (/unique_chucks/17/0xe5cff4de133f7c23898ce49dad5a3715f507d85d.sol#269-270)

LOCIairdropper.ownerRecoverTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0xe5cff4de133f7c23898ce49dad5a3715f507d85d.sol#286-289) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokensRemaining) (/unique_chucks/17/0xe5cff4de133f7c23898ce49dad5a3715f507d85d.sol)

LOCIairdropper.transfer has external calls inside a loop:
